name: Medieval Battalion PRO
description:
Medieval battalion is a “first-people” shooting game, where you control a squad of 10 elite muskets protecting your valuable fortress. The enemy will come at you in waves, axemen, archers, pikemen and horsemen will attempt to topple your lines and go in the fortress. Aim 5 muskets simultaneously, and have them fire their shots toward the enemy to stop them. Advance in this endless game, earn coins as you eliminate your enemy and reinforce your battalion with power-ups such as scattered bullets, slow motion or heal. Your battalion is counting on you commander!

*Ads Free*
